known_issues: Boxes and buttons are rendering without colors (blank appearance) - reported in version 29

existing_features.title: Ensure the OKLCH color system variables defined in frontend/index.css are properly applied throughout all components. Verify that CSS custom properties (--color-primary, --color-surface, etc.) are correctly referenced in component styles.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore background colors and border colors to all button elements across the application. Buttons should render with visible colors matching the OKLCH color system defined in the index.css file.

Restore background colors and border colors to all card and box components (including product cards, diet plan cards, recommendation sections, and form containers). All boxes should render with visible styling matching the design system.

projectName: Fix missing colors on buttons and boxes
